pullrequest.title: update shim controller to do pid servo control

content.raw:
Atlas with sandia hands starts with the arms waving wildly in the air. It looks like Atlas starts with arms at its sides, and then a controller moves the arms up to the cross position.

Atlas v3 has similar issues, but the legs also move oddly.
content.html:
Atlas with sandia hands starts with the arms waving wildly in the air. It looks like Atlas starts with arms at its sides, and then a controller moves the arms up to the cross position.

Atlas v3 has similar issues, but the legs also move oddly.
